meanings.definition: The state or quality of being superfluid.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the superfluidities of the liquid helium.
meanings.sent2: The superfluidities of the river allowed it to flow effortlessly around the rocks.
meanings.sent3: The superfluidities of the chocolate fountain made it a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves had a certain superfluidities that mesmerized the audience.
meanings.sent5: The superfluidities of the fog created an ethereal and mysterious atmosphere.
